patthana22.29:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaccayo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye tīṇi.
patthana22.29:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca,
patthana22.29:3.1_0: Naanidassanaappaṭigho nanasanidassano dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa nasanidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe tīṇi,
patthana22.29:3.1_1: adhipatiyā upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.29:4.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava,
patthana22.29:4.1_1: adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.29:5.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana22.29:6.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.29:6.1_2: adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.29:7.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naarūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.29:8.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana22.29:9.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.29:10.1_0: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. Hetuyā ekavīsa.
patthana22.29:11.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nalokiyañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nalokiyañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana22.29:12.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.29:13.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.29:13.1_2: ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe pannarasa …pe… avigate pañcatiṁsa.
patthana22.29:14.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.29:14.1_2: ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe pannarasa …pe… avigate pañcatiṁsa.
